text: Please bring back the combined CSS functionality. Pages are much slower now (at least that's what Lighthouse/Google PSI tells us) without the combined CSS. Maybe have a checkbox somewhere so we can choose to combine or not the CSS on a website.

This has had a negative effect on organic traffic as a result. Google is now penalizing websites that have pages, that do not pass the *Core Web Vitals/Page Experience* algorithm update. <@U7SL518D6>  any ideas would be appreciated thank you!
